firstThreeBlogPosts.title: Building a search engine for meme captions
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Alex C-G
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: AI-powered text search engine which goes through a dataset of memes and return URLs to the images as well as metadata.

firstThreeBlogPosts.title: BigTransfer Encoder vs CLIP Image Encoder
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Alex C-G
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: We aim to test the two types of image encoders that can be compared for a similarity (“nearest neighbor”) search. Let's see who is the winner!

firstThreeBlogPosts.title: Announcing the winners of our Jina 2.0 meme contest
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Nishil Madhani
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: We are excited to announce the winners of the meme contest for Jina 2.0! Thank you to everyone who took part!
